    • Ship

      public Ship(int shipSize)
      Constructor with the parameter shipSize.

      shipSize - , integer with the size of the ship

  • Method Details

    • shootAt

      public Square.Damage shootAt()
      Returns the damage due to a shot to the ship. If the ship sinks with the shot, the damage will be Massive. If not, it will be severe.
      Specified by:
      shootAt in interface Target
      Returns:
      Damage value, with SEVERE if the ship does not sink or MASSIVE in the ship has no squares left

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the value of the size of the ship
      Returns:
      integer with the size of the ship

    • isSunk

      public boolean isSunk()
      Checks if the ship is sunk (all the squares have been hit
      Returns:
      boolean with true if the ships is sunk or false if not

    • toChar

      public char toChar()
      Returns the type of ship with the following description S --> Submarine D --> Destroyer C --> Cruiser B --> Battleship
      Specified by:
      toChar in interface Target
      Returns:
      the char according to the previous information

    • toFiredChar

      public char toFiredChar()
